4095da7d-3c79-4ad4-9f27-3afd22778752:
Whenever the wielder uses this grenade, they suffer 5 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}.
This grenade creates a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area which lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, deals 10 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} with 30% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} on impact, and inflicts burning (<u>10 × Dogmatic rank</u>).
43e9ed9d-4edb-47e3-bea3-f6b3494bd900: Deals <u>(from 10 to 15)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} with 20% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and 20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}. It immediately provokes each character in the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} to attack the nearest ally if they fail a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.
49938f4f-9395-4dcd-9391-550e7b8274c2:
Requires Heretical — Zealot
Deals <u>(from 30 to 40)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}.
52b4a0e1-eb00-4ee3-811b-fa343fbebd24: Targets in a 1-cell radius suffer <u>(from 8 to 10)</u> mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and gain 6 stacks of the {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} effect. Starting from the next {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, 1 stack of disturbed is removed every round. Also, the grenade decreases the target's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} by −1 until the end of combat. This effect does not stack and affects the target even if they {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} this grenade.
58c3c952-17c1-453f-a10f-122aef9d3496:
Targets within the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −<u>({g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} and gain 2 stacks of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
If the wielder has Iconoclast — Zealot, all their allies ignore this effect.
5cb46d72-4251-4f3a-be85-fa8fe3515c78: This grenade creates a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area which lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, deals 10 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} with 20% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} on impact, and inflicts burning (6) for 3 rounds.
62637626-89cb-4b45-aa40-f16ae7a5046f:
All creatures that enter the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} created by this grenade must pass {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} with a −<u>({g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.
<indent=5%>- On a failed Toughness test the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}</indent>
<indent=5%>- On a failed Strength test — {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 2 rounds</indent>
<indent=5%>- On a failed Willpower test — {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} for 2 rounds</indent>
73f1b39f-20d8-461b-a5ce-0eaa4c84ccd8: Emits a blinding flash of light and a loud blast. Creatures caught in that blast must succeed on a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −<u>({g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. On a successful test, creatures become {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}. Stacks.
7446934d-c519-4289-81ed-90281c834c44:
Deals 5 {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} within the area and pushes the targets 2 cells away.
If a target in this area fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}, it falls {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
81386111-b5b3-433a-9bb8-15a6b1788163:
Deals <u>(from 50 to 100)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g} with 30% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.
It also inflicts +2 stacks of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} until the end of combat.
At the start of each of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, it gains an additional +1 stack of perplexed.
82ed2539-e415-43e8-a309-0e564b269c7c: This grenade blinds all enemies within the area for 2 turns if they fail a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. Enemies which succeed upon that Toughness test become {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} for 2 turns.
8b4046ab-cdbe-45e9-85e4-97edd7e4722a:
All targets in a 1-cell radius of the epicentre of the explosion suffer <u>from 20 to 40</u> {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}piercing damage{/g}, with 45% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.
If the target does not {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} this grenade, they also suffer 30 mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
9cba3fd6-52c8-439d-8501-cc31ee3a870e:
This grenade creates a toxic area of thick smoke which lasts for 4 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} and decreases chance to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and to be hit with {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons by −50%.
If the target in that area fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −<u>({g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, it suffers from {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxin{/g} (20).
a1347401-8109-4b8f-a587-fc35605dee3f:
Deals <u>(from 25 to 50)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} with 20% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and inflicts 3 stacks of the {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g} effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
If the target has {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} this grenade, only 1 stack of melting is inflicted.
b6c863bb-7fa9-4564-aa74-fd007ff85bac: Deals <u>(from 12 to 24)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}impact damage{/g} within the area. This attack has 20% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.
bc0eda0e-56b7-4b7d-8217-141496e64026:
This grenade creates a toxic zone until the end of combat.
Each unit within that zone is dealt 50 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}.
dbbab2a9-479f-4bb5-b23f-58c9a29ea08a: Deals <u>(from 10 to 20)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} with 40% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and blinds enemies for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g} if they fail a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.
e713ff9d-ac0b-42fd-bebc-a5bb90cf1138:
Targets become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
If the target successfully {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} this grenade, it suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} effect instead.
e905529c-5936-4326-815c-be74091b76e3: Creates a toxic area which lasts for 4 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} and deals 8 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} to anyone who enters the area or starts their round inside it.
ed7335ae-500f-4c64-a649-196f963bd21c: Creates a 3×3 Zone of Fear in the area of explosion for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Zone of Fear: all creatures in a 3×3 zone must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or immediately move out of the zone even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. This movement triggers {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from the {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} user's allies that have passed the {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or that are outside the zone.
